constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 179 (Tuesday, October 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LATTA:
H.R. 5563.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: Congress shall have the
power . . . ``to regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H5631]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Stop Penalizing Working Seniors Act
